description:
Script to build a HMM profile from a multiple sequence alignment (MSA).
    Allows the user to specify the ACC, NAME, and DESC fields of the HMM profile.

parameters.name: Input
parameters.help: Path of input msa. If not supplied, reads from stdin. Acceptable formats are the same as for hmmbuild.

parameters.name: Output
parameters.help: hmm output file path. If not supplied writes to stdout.

parameters.name: Alphabet
parameters.help: Alphabet of the input MSA. If not supplied, inferred from the input.
